=== AP Ticket System Link ===
Contributors: Aaron T. Grogg
Tags: administration, support
Requires at least: 3.0.0
Tested up to: 4.5
Stable tag: trunk
License: GPLv2 or later
License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html

Adds an internal ticketing system link to AdvantiPro website dashboards.

== Description ==
Makes submitting a support ticket to AdvantiPro easier by adding an internal ticketing system link to website's dashboard.

Submit by creating a new ticket in the ticketing system itself, or by sending an email to support@advantiprotickets.com.

== Installation ==

= Requirements =
* WordPress Multisite 3.0+
* PHP 5.3*, newer PHP versions will work faster.

= Installation =
* Use the installer via back-end of your install or ...

1. Unpack the download-package
2. Upload the files to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
3. Activate the plugin through the 'Network/Plugins' menu in WordPress and hit 'Network Activate'
4. No options, no settings, just works

== Changelog ==
= 1.0 (2016-Aug-23) =
 * First release.
